author: Megan Molteni
title: Most Kids Only Get Mildly Sick From Covid-19—but Not All
description: New studies suggest that while children still fare better than adults, babies, toddlers and kids with other conditions remain at risk.
content: The group published their results last Monday in the journal Pediatrics. Although clinical manifestations of childrens Covid-19 cases were generally less severe than those of adult patients, young children, particularly infants, were vulnerable to Covid-19 in… [+6106 chars]
